# Vassiliy Lakhonin

> Program/Portfolio Manager (Evidence & Compliance, Cross-Border), also open to PMO/Compliance Program Manager roles in private sector.

## Key pages
- [CV (web)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/): One-page CV.
- [CV (PDF)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/Vassiliy-Lakhonin_CV.pdf): Downloadable PDF.
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vassiliy-lakhonin/): Profile.
- [Case study: Donor reporting quality and delivery reliability](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-donor-reporting.html): Problem-action-result proof with measurable outcomes.
- [Case study: Cross-country portfolio delivery and audit readiness](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-portfolio-audit-readiness.html): Delivery control and zero-finding audit outcome across 5 countries.
- [Reporting sample](https://6969b765e613b56bb78e91c6--visionary-sunflower-a27912.netlify.app): Sample reporting page.
- [KPI tracker sample](https://6969b58d8292274eb8775c89--precious-cobbler-f56f89.netlify.app): Sample KPI tracking page.
- [CustomGPT sample: Development & Humanitarian Aid Advisor](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-wt6hVocuB-development-and-humanitarian-aid-advisor): Domain-specific advisory GPT.

## Focus keywords
- MEL systems, donor reporting, compliance evidence, audit readiness, KPI dashboards.
- Cross-border portfolio delivery, PMO operations, risk tracking, stakeholder management.
